profile-title: Developer specialized in Video Games and Web Applications
about-me-description: I’m a developer with training in web applications and a specialization in video games and virtual reality. Since I was a child, I’ve been passionate about computing, video games, and technology.
education-description-1: I studied the Higher Degree in Web Application Development at IES Rafael Alberti (Cádiz), where I learned frontend and backend with technologies such as JavaScript, Java, PHP, Python, and frameworks like Vue and React.
education-description-2: Later, I completed the Specialization Course in Video Games and Virtual Reality, where I worked with Unity and Godot, programming in C# and GDScript, and creating experiences in virtual and mixed reality. I participated in collaborative projects and events like the Málaga Jam 2025.
objectives-description: I’m interested in continuing to grow as a developer in web or interactive projects, combining creativity, technology, and clean code.
availability-description: I’m currently available for new projects and collaborations. If you have an interesting idea or need a developer for your team, don’t hesitate to contact me.

games.name: Midnight Gallery
games.description: Midnight Gallery is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements in which you play as Kassia, a brave adventurer exploring the darkest and most mysterious corners of history. Her goal is to recover forgotten relics and treasures to enrich a museum that seeks to preserve humanity's legacy. Throughout her journey, Kassia will face physical challenges, puzzles, and traps that will test her wit and skills.

games.name: Los Giros
games.description: Los Giros is a game where the world is in 3D, but both enemies and environments are represented in 2D. You play as John Colt, a bounty hunter who must eliminate all enemies in his path.

games.name: GlobRush
games.description: In this game, the character's organs play a key role in the difficulty. Each organ has an “oxygen” percentage, and if it drops below a certain level, “negative effects” are triggered that increase the challenge of the game.

languages-description: I have an advanced level of English, which allows me to understand and communicate fluently in this language. Additionally, I have a native level of Spanish, enabling me to work and collaborate on projects in this language without issues.
